headline: Assurant Board of Directors Authorizes $700 Million Share Repurchase Program and Approves Common Stock Dividend Increase of 10%
summary: ATLANTA, November 13, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, announced today that its Board of Directors (Board) authorized a repurchase program for up to $700 million of the company’s outstanding common stock.
